projectGridLines.title: Tech Project
projectGridLines.description:
About the Role

Are you a passionate web or mobile developer eager to gain practical experience in a

fast-paced deep-tech company? We're looking for an enthusiastic intern to join our team and

contribute to the development of cutting-edge PropTech solutions.

Responsibilities:

? Contribute to the development of modules for both existing and upcoming solutions

? Take ownership of features, from Low-Level Design (LLD) to complete development

? Work on projects involving web and/or mobile applications

? Collaborate with the development team to ensure high-quality code

Qualifications:

? Strong understanding of web or mobile development technologies (e.g., ReactJS, Java, Swift)

? Eagerness to learn and apply knowledge in a real-world setting

? Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

? Ability to work independently and as part of a team
